author: Russell Richardson
comment: Very crisply displayed on my G Watch R! Also has great complication support feeling which not a lot of faces have still. Thanks!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Russell ... thanks so much, means a lot!

author: Lance Stratton
comment: Really well designed, well thought out. My daughters love this watch face. Thanks for putting such care in to your watch faces. Real quality.
